statements: SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE ticket_id = 1;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_id, ticket_type FROM tickets WHERE purchase_date = '2022-07-15';
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_type, ticket_price FROM tickets WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE ticket_price > 50.00 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC, customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) as total_tickets FROM tickets GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_tickets > 2;
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE customer_id = 101 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_id, ticket_price FROM tickets WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01' AND purchase_date <= '2022-03-31';
SELECT AVG(ticket_price) AS avg_ticket_price, ticket_type FROM tickets GROUP BY ticket_type HAVING COUNT(*) >= 2;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_type, purchase_date FROM tickets WHERE ticket_price > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(ticket_price) AS avg_ticket_price FROM tickets GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY avg_ticket_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email_address LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_type, ticket_price FROM tickets WHERE ticket_price > 50 ORDER BY ticket_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, ticket_type FROM customers c INNER JOIN tickets t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id WHERE t.ticket_date = DATE '2022-05-10';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE email_address LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_date, ticket_price FROM tickets WHERE ticket_type = 'Concert';
SELECT customer_name, ticket_date, ticket_price FROM customers INNER JOIN tickets ON customers.customer_id = tickets.customer_id WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY ticket_price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(ticket_id) AS number_of_tickets FROM tickets GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(ticket_id) > 3;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_name, price FROM tickets WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_name, email, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT purchase_date, ticket_name FROM tickets ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;

SELECT customers.customer_name, tickets.ticket_name, purchases.purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id JOIN tickets ON purchases.ticket_id = tickets.ticket_id;

SELECT customer_name, ticket_name, price FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id JOIN tickets ON purchases.ticket_id = tickets.ticket_id WHERE customers.customer_name LIKE '%A%' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT ticket_name, ticket_price FROM tickets ORDER BY ticket_price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email, recommendation_id FROM customers JOIN recommendations ON customers.customer_id = recommendations.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customers LEFT JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT customers.customer_name, SUM(purchases.purchase_amount) AS total_purchase FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id GROUP BY customers.customer_id;

SELECT customers.customer_name, tickets.ticket_name, recommendations.relevance_score FROM customers JOIN recommendations ON customers.customer_id = recommendations.customer_id JOIN tickets ON recommendations.ticket_id = tickets.ticket_id ORDER BY recommendations.relevance_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '+1%';
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM purchases WHERE price >= 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT ticket_name, venue, price FROM tickets WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number, address FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT customer_name, product_name, price FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id ORDER BY price DESC;
